description: The svalbard light cotton Pants are lightweight and packable hiking and trekking pants made in organic cotton, recycled polyamide and an elastane mix. Comfort and durability is key to this product, as well as a progressive Norrøna look. It features hand pockets with a hidden zipped security pocket for spare money or other belongings for the backpacking user, two back pockets and thigh venting with mesh to keep bugs out. The svalbard light cotton Pants has a regular fit with articulated knees.
name: Norrona Svalbard Light Cotton Pants - Mens
